member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.UI.DataSourceControls.WebHierarchicalDataSource
member.summary: WebHierarchicalDataSource is a hierarchical datasource control allowing you to combine any number of flat datasources into a hierarchy. The control supports all flat declarative datasources - AccessDataSource, SqlDataSource, WebHierarchicalDataSource, ObjectDataSource - they can be specified both using Visual Studio.NET design time or at runtime. You can also use a wide range of datasource objects at runtime, like arrays, collections, DataSet/DataTable, etc. You can mix any number/type of datasource. The control can be used in various databinding scenarios, for example binding to hierarchical databound controls like WebDataTree, UltraWebTree, the built-in asp:treeview/menu, UltraWebGrid, WebDataGrid, etc.

member.summary: Gets percentage of the label's location within slider bar. Value is in range from 0 to 1. Note: if static labels were set (SliderTickmarks.SetLabels), then that value is null.

member.summary: Gets the id of label starting from the bottom label of vertical slider or left label of horizontal slider.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderFormatTickmarkLabelEventArgs.LeftTop
member.summary: Gets location of label. True: left for vertical slider or top for horizontal slider. False: right for vertical slider or bottom for horizontal slider. That property is not applied, when slider has 2 labels on edges.

member.summary: Constructor for SliderButton
member.param: Value of the IsTrackingViewState of owner.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderButton.CssClass
member.summary: Gets sets the custom css class applied to plus and minus buttons of slider.

remarks.p: That class is merged with AppStyling css class igsli_Button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderButton.ImageUrl
member.summary: Gets sets the custom image url used for plus or minus button in slider.

remarks.p: If value is not set, then AppStyling image is used automatically. For horizontal slider it is igsli_PlusH.gif or igsli_MinusH.gif, and for vertical slider it is igsli_PlusV.gif or igsli_MinusV.gif.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderButton.HoverImageUrl
member.summary: Gets sets the custom image url used for plus or minus button in slider when mouse is moved over it.

remarks.p: If value is not set, then AppStyling image is used automatically. For horizontal slider it is igsli_PlusHoverH.gif or igsli_MinusHoverH.gif, and for vertical slider it is igsli_PlusHoverV.gif or igsli_MinusHoverV.gif.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderButton.FocusImageUrl
member.summary: Gets sets the custom image url used for plus or minus button in slider when control has focus.

remarks.p: If value is not set, then AppStyling image is used automatically. For horizontal slider it is igsli_PlusFocusH.gif or igsli_MinusFocusH.gif, and for vertical slider it is igsli_PlusFocusV.gif or igsli_MinusFocusV.gif.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderButton.PressedImageUrl
member.summary: Gets sets the custom image url used for pressed plus or minus button in slider.

remarks.p: If value is not set, then AppStyling image is used automatically. For horizontal slider it is igsli_PlusPressH.gif or igsli_MinusPressH.gif, and for vertical slider it is igsli_PlusPressV.gif or igsli_MinusPressV.gif.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderButton.DisabledImageUrl
member.summary: Gets sets the custom image url used for disabled plus or minus button in slider.

remarks.p: If value is not set, then AppStyling image is used automatically. For horizontal slider it is igsli_PlusDisableH.gif or igsli_MinusDisableH.gif, and for vertical slider it is igsli_PlusDisableV.gif or igsli_MinusDisableV.gif.

member.summary: Not available.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderThumb.ImageUrl

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderThumb.HoverImageUrl
member.summary: Gets sets the custom image used for thumb in mouse-over state.

remarks.p: If value is not set, then AppStyling image is used automatically. For horizontal slider it is igsli_ThumbHoverH.gif and for vertical slider it is igsli_ThumbHoverV.gif.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderThumb.PressedImageUrl
member.summary: Gets sets the custom image used for thumb in pressed state.

remarks.p: If value is not set, then AppStyling image is used automatically. For horizontal slider it is igsli_ThumbPressH.gif and for vertical slider it is igsli_ThumbPressV.gif.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderThumb.FocusImageUrl
member.summary: Gets sets the custom image used for thumb in focus state.

remarks.p: If value is not set, then AppStyling image is used automatically. For horizontal slider it is igsli_ThumbFocusH.gif and for vertical slider it is igsli_ThumbFocusV.gif.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderThumb.DisabledImageUrl
member.summary: Gets sets the custom image used for thumb in disabled state.

remarks.p: If value is not set, then AppStyling image is used automatically. For horizontal slider it is igsli_ThumbDisableH.gif and for vertical slider it is igsli_ThumbDisableV.gif.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderThumb.Visible
member.summary: Gets sets the visibility of thumb.

remarks.p: If thumb is not visible then its image is not displayed, but all functionality (including ability to drag value by mouse) remains the same.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderThumb.Enabled
member.summary: Gets sets the enabled or disabled state of thumb.

remarks.p: If thumb is disabled, then DisabledImageUrl is used and thumb can not be moved by user.

member.summary: Gets sets the number of labels for tick marks.

remarks.p:

If the CustomLabelsText/SetCustomLabelAt was used, then that property has no effect.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderTickmarks.CustomLabelsText
member.summary: Gets sets custom labels for tickmarks.

remarks.p:
Notes:
Labels are separated by new line characters. To customize a value at run time it is recommended to use Get/SetCustomLabelAt methods.
If property is not set, then labels are built automatically using NumberOfLabels and LabelFormatString properties.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.SliderValueLabel.Format
member.summary: Gets sets the format string applied to Value and SecondaryValue of WebSlider.

remarks.p:
The only simple "{0}" format is recognized.
Default format depends on WebSlider.EnableSecondaryValue, WebSlider.Track.FillValueMode and Location properties and it can be "{0}" or "{0}:{1}".
If application needs special format, then it should process ClientEvents.FormatValueLabel.
The "|" character is not supported.
Notes for situation when WebSlider.EnableSecondaryValue is enabled:
In order to show 2 values on a single label, that property should contain both "{0}" and "{1}" substrings. In this case the "{0}" will be replaced by WebSlider.Value and "{1}" will be replaced by WebSlider.SecondaryValue.
If Location is set to FloatXxx and property contains only "{0}", then 2 labels will be displayed.
Examples:
"{0} - {1}" - show Value and SecondaryValue separated by " - "
"{0}" - show SecondaryValue and Value on separate labels
"$ {0}" - show "$ " prefix in front of value
"{0}% {1}%" - show "%" suffixes after values

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.Value
member.summary: Gets sets main value.

remarks.p:
Notes:
The type of object returned by the get of this property is defined by the ValueType.
If value is not set or it is smaller than MinValue, then at run time the MinValue is used automatically.
If value is larger than MaxValue, then the MaxValue is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.ValueAsDouble
member.summary: Gets sets main value as double.
member.remarks:
If value is not set or it is smaller than MinValueAsDouble, then at run time the MinValueAsDouble is used automatically.
If value is larger than MaxValueAsDouble, then the MaxValueAsDouble is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.ValueAsString
member.summary: Gets sets main value as string.
member.remarks:
If value is not set or it is smaller than MinValue, then at run time the MinValue is used automatically.
If value is larger than MaxValue, then the MaxValue is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.SecondaryValue
member.summary: Gets sets secondary value.

remarks.p:
Notes:
That property has effect only if EnableSecondaryValue is set to true.
The type of object returned by the get of this property is defined by the ValueType.
If value is not set or it is larger than MaxValue, then at run time the MaxValue is used automatically.
If value is smaller than MinValue, then the MinValue is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.SecondaryValueAsDouble
member.summary: Gets sets secondary value as double.
member.remarks:
If value is not set or it is larger than MaxValueAsDouble, then at run time the MaxValueAsDouble is used automatically.
If value is smaller than MinValueAsDouble, then the MinValueAsDouble is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.SecondaryValueAsString
member.summary: Gets sets secondary value as string.
member.remarks:
If value is not set or it is larger than MaxValue, then at run time the MaxValue is used automatically.
If value is smaller than MinValue, then the MinValue is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.LargeChange
member.summary: Gets sets value which is used to move a thumb when the user presses the PageUp/PageDown keys.
member.remarks:
The type of object returned by the get of this property is defined by the ValueType. However, in case of the DateTime, the TimeSpan is used.
If value is not set, then the 10% is used automatically.
That value also can be used by clicks on margins between track bar and buttons.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.LargeChangeAsDouble
member.summary: Gets sets value which is used to move a thumb when the user presses the PageUp/PageDown keys.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.LargeChangeAsString
member.summary: Gets sets value which is used to move a thumb when the user presses the PageUp/PageDown keys as string.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.SmallChange
member.summary: Gets sets value which is used move a thumb when the user presses the arrow keys or plus, minus buttons.
member.remarks:
The type of object returned by the get of this property is defined by the ValueType. However, in case of the DateTime,- the TimeSpan is used.
If value is not set, then the 2% is used automatically.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.SmallChangeAsDouble
member.summary: Gets sets value which is used move a thumb when the user presses the arrow keys.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.SmallChangeAsString
member.summary: Gets sets value which is used move a thumb when the user presses the arrow keys as string.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.MinValue
member.summary: Gets sets minimum value.
member.remarks: The type of object returned by the get of this property is defined by the ValueType. If value is not set, then 0 is used automatically. In case of DateTime the January 1st of current year is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.MinValueAsDouble
member.summary: Gets sets minimum value as string.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.MinValueAsString
member.summary: Gets sets minimum value as string.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.MaxValue
member.summary: Gets sets maximum value.
member.remarks: The type of object returned by the get of this property is defined by the ValueType. If value is not set, then 100 is used automatically. In case of DateTime the December 31st of current year is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.MaxValueAsDouble
member.summary: Gets sets maximum value as double.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.MaxValueAsString
member.summary: Gets sets maximum value as string.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.FirstTickmarkValueAsDouble
member.summary: Gets sets the value for the first tick mark as double.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.FirstTickmarkValueAsString
member.summary: Gets sets the value for the first tick mark as string.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.LastTickmarkValueAsDouble
member.summary: Gets sets the value for the last tick mark as double.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.LastTickmarkValueAsString
member.summary: Gets sets the value for the last tick mark as string.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.ValueType
member.summary: Gets or sets type of values used by "object" type properties of WebSlider related to values such as Value, MinValue, SmallChange, FirstTickmarkValue, etc.
member.remarks:
In case of DateTime, the TimeSpan is used for SmallChange and LargeChange properties; for all other properties the DateTime is used.
For all other types, the corresponding type is used for all properties.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets horizontal or vertical orientation of WebSlider.

member.summary: Gets sets ability to activate SecondaryThumb.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.ShowPlusMinusButtons
member.summary: Gets sets visibility of plus and minus buttons.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.ThumbsInteractionMode
member.summary: Gets sets behavior of thumbs when EnableSecondaryValue property is enabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.MarginClickAction
member.summary: Gets sets the action performed when a margin between buttons and track bar is clicked by mouse.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.MarginDoubleClickAction

member.summary: Gets sets ability to position thumbs only on values which match with SmallChange.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.Focusable
member.summary: Gets sets ability to get focus and process keyboard.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.ThumbsHolderCssClass
member.summary: Gets sets the custom css class applied to html element which contains thumbs.

remarks.p: That class is merged with the AppStyling css class igsli_ThumbsHolderH or igsli_ThumbsHolderV depending on orientation of slider.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.ContentAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets alignment of content within bounds of control.

remarks.p: That defines vertical alignment for horizontal slider or horizontal aligment for vertical slider.

Note:
If value is set to TrackCenter, then at design time the Center is used, and at run time it is possible flickering while initialization of control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.CssClass
member.summary: Gets sets the custom css class which is applied to slider.

remarks.p: That class is merged with the AppStyling css class igsli_Control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.HoverCssClass
member.summary: Gets sets the custom css class which is applied to slider when mouse is moved over it.

remarks.p: That class is merged with the CssClass and AppStyling css class igsli_Hover.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.FocusCssClass
member.summary: Gets sets the custom css class which is applied to slider when it has focus.

remarks.p: That class is merged with the CssClass and AppStyling css class igsli_Focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.UI.EditorControls.WebSlider.DisabledCssClass
member.summary: Gets sets the css custom class which is applied to slider when it is disabled.

remarks.p: That class is merged with the CssClass and AppStyling css class igsli_Disabled.
